forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 17 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a bright sun, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The high temperature hovers around the mid-60s, a gentle invitation for an afternoon stroll or a quiet moment in the park. As the winds whip in from the west-southwest, bringing a refreshing breeze, one can almost feel the energy of the Bay coursing through the air, though the gusts remind you to hold onto your hats. As the afternoon draws closer to evening, the clouds will gather more significantly, with a shy whisper of moisture. The temperatures will settle into a comfortable realm, hinting at a cozy evening ahead.

The clarity of the day is a testament to summertime in San Francisco, though little pockets of fog may betray the persistent marine layer hovering just beyond the Golden Gate. The allure of the city beckons for modest layers; a light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve one well as the sun begins its descent. With the inviting weather, consider wandering through the neighborhood, perhaps stopping for a quiet coffee or exploring an open-air market. The blend of warmth and wind creates an ideal backdrop for both quiet reflection and gentle conversation, embodying the heart of San Francisco living.
